programmes.show_description: Park's Towing race to recover five cars dumped down a steep ravine. Clayton's Towing recover a stranded yacht, and North Coast Towing try to dislodge a bogged tipper before it rolls over. (Ep8)
Reality series. Facing unforgiving road conditions, Polar Industries and Darrell Ward set off on another season of intense trucking and fierce competition.
On the North York Moors, a 50-ton construction machine and a 20-ton trailer have crashed off a narrow country lane. The rescue team at Alpha face a treacherous cross-country journey.
Highlights from the series that follows experts who transport huge and unusual loads across the nation. (Ep4)
Teleshopping.
Shop by phone from the comfort of your home.
Dormeo - the home of a great night's sleep.
Shop JML, the home for clever ideas.
Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals to ensure your next cruise holiday is your greatest one!
A daily round-up of showbiz news and gossip from around the world, focusing on celebrities, movies, music and entertainment.
On a busy Bank Holiday weekend, a day trip to Scarborough turns into a high-speed pursuit and a desperate suspect on a motorbike puts lives at risk when a passenger falls off.
A dog unit is deployed for an extreme version of 'hide and seek', and interceptors pursue a transit van tearaway.
Police intercept units on patrol. Rob and Dan pursue of an under-powered runaway hatchback before the suspect decamps and makes a run for it - in a fluorescent jacket!
Western starring John Wayne. A group of people travelling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process. (1939)

Western starring John Wayne. A group of people travelling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process. (1939)
Western starring Glenn Ford and Ida Lupino. A young man searches for a lost Arizona gold mine, discovered by his greedy grandfather back in the 1800s. (1949)

Western starring Glenn Ford and Ida Lupino. A young man searches for a lost Arizona gold mine, discovered by his greedy grandfather back in the 1800s. (1949)
Smurf and Ian travel to the Scottish Highlands to move a 110-tonne metal drum used for industrial paper drying, and in Chester a 5-tonne freezer unit needs shifting to the race course.
Documentary series following the crews who keep Britain moving when a big freeze strikes.
Jacko is on the hunt for a wanted teenager, and the interceptors are hot on the heels of a stolen silver Micra.
After a high speed pursuit, interceptor Liam Sewell hunts down a wanted teenager. Jacko plays a game of cat-and-mouse with a youth.
World Number 1 Judd Trump takes on three-time World Champion Mark Williams in a mouthwatering clash, with a semi final place on the line.
A taxi driver runs a red light, inadvertently setting off a bizarre chain of events. A driver caught using his phone while driving mounts a vehement defence.
Journalist Phil Cox is investigating allegations of illegally deployed chemical weapons when he's taken hostage.
Truckworks clear a burnt-out B-Double. Wagga Towing head to a rural farm property to salvage a burnt-out Steiger and Clayton's Towing recover a P3-Orion for the Queensland Air Museum. (Ep9/9)
Reality series. The drivers of Polar Industries are pushed to the limit, Art Burke faces one of the world's longest ice roads, and Todd finds himself in a tight situation.
On a remote Yorkshire Dales track, Alpha recovery ops face one of their toughest rescue missions - a 50-ton construction machine is stranded by a severely-damaged Victorian bridge.
A car takes on a power pole, a panel beater goes for a skate and the owner of an expensive Bentley tests a policeman's patience.

A car thief rams the cops off the road, a gang travel into North Yorkshire for some high-end shoplifting, and a suspected scrap metal thief claims he's running a legitimate business.
Lisa and Lewis tackle a troublesome lad with a potty mouth, followed by a trip to the canal, where a member of the public has heard gunshots.
Reality series following high-speed police intercept units. The interceptors assemble in pursuit of a BMW with no insurance, no tax and a suspected banned driver behind the wheel.
Powerful western starring Paul Newman and Lita Milan. When his mentor is gunned down in a range war, legendary gunslinger Billy the Kid tracks down the killers. (1958)

Western starring George Montgomery and Dorothy Malone. Drifter Cruze becomes marshal of Marlpine but must face the murderous Moran brothers alone when the frightened town won't back him. (1954)

Western starring George Montgomery and Dorothy Malone. Drifter Cruze becomes marshal of Marlpine but must face the murderous Moran brothers alone when the frightened town won't back him. (1954)
In south Wales, Craig tackles a 60-tonne piling rig used to set foundations for large buildings. In Rochdale, Matt must load then deliver a stone crusher to a site in the Lake District.
Documentary series following the crews who keep Britain moving when a big freeze strikes.
Documentary series following the crews who keep Britain moving when a big freeze strikes.
Presenters Rick Edwards and Ortis Delay are out with the police interceptors as they tackle the difficult night shift.
In this special episode, the interceptor's take on the young and reckless who cause carnage on our roads and put themselves and others in danger.
New Jersey police crack down on reckless driving. A cop is called to an exploding minibus and attends a three-car crash on one of the state's most dangerous roads. (Ep1)
A woman's car is stolen at knifepoint and police mobilize to find her vehicle and the perpetrator; police break down the door of a woman who has failed to appear for her hearing.
A woman asks police to get involved after her ex threatened to destroy her home. Prior medical procedures drive a woman to find a dangerous way to ease her pain.
A seasoned corporal gives some advice to a young man with a new motorcycle. A woman's impatience lands her in hot water when she's pulled over for tailgating.
When the plan to smuggle marijuana from Mexico into the U.S. was interrupted, Steve Peterson faced time behind bars... unless he could find a way to escape.
